txt.en: Indir can be found in Arnach, near the keep.\n\nYou should return to Indir and tell him that the remaining seed stores have been safely hidden from the foe.
Lossarnach's seed stores can be found in the farms north-east of Arnach.\n\nYou should travel to the remaining farms to the north-east and do what you can to hide and protect the seed stores there.

'Though Dagor might care little, I for one will sleep easier knowing we might eat in nine months' time, [placeholder]. Thank you for helping us in these dire times. I know we are one among many needing help from heroes like you.'

'Though Dagor might care little, I for one will sleep easier knowing we might eat in nine months' time, [placeholder]. Thank you for helping us in these dire times. I know we are one among many needing help from heroes like you.'

'These times of war have thwarted spring planting, [placeholder]. The Haradrim have put some of our farmland to the torch, and in the rest our seed stores lie exposed and vulnerable.

'Even if Dagor's grand war-plans defend us from the Haradrim here, we may yet starve in the coming winter. Already we have missed first planting. We face hard times at our most fortunate!

'Good [placeholder], will you visit the farms to Arnach's north-east and defend its stores of seed?'

Much of Lossarnach's farmland is burned and the first planting has been missed. Indir fears that if the Haradrim discover Arnach's grain supplies, no victory will forestall thin crops and starvation in seasons to come.
Defeat Haradrim Raiders near the farms ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
